A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Really bad Luke/Ray dialogue\, turning Poe into an unsympathetic heel\, the Deus ex codemaster\, poorly timed and out-of-character humor ... So much sloppy stuff in this film. Also\, while I have no problem with Rose or the actress who played her (her character was one of the better comedic deliverers)\,  the Finn/Ray chemistry which made the previous movie fun is totally gone here. It's a necessary part of the cannon to watch this\, but it's not one I'll be watching again\, which is disappointing after force awakens and rogue one.
